messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Enemy communication intercepted. Security level elevated.

A summary has been copied and printed to all communications consoles.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Central Command Medium-Priority Update

Based on energy emissions we detected, we believe that all of the station's [REDACTED] has developed moderate level intelligence, and the ability to communicate.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Anomaly Alert

Gravitational anomaly detected on long range scanners. Expected location: Cargo Office.

messages.author: Central Command
messages.body:
Migration Alert

Due to Ragnarok, a number of wire eating mammals have migrated into the maintenance areas.
